Other Services.

Flexible solutions for your U.S. business

We don’t just register companies — we guide them through every stage: from updates and marketplace setups to dissolutions.

Didn’t find what you’re looking for? It’s probably here.

01 Company Changes
  • Change of legal address
  • Company name change
  • Entity type conversion (LLC → Corp / S-Election)
  • Tax status updates
  • IRS & Florida Sunbiz notifications
  • Form prep and official filings
See Price
02 Business & Tax Consultations
  • 1-on-1 analysis of your business situation
  • LLC / C‑Corp / S‑Corp comparison
  • Profit distribution and tax optimization
  • U.S. sales, hiring, and KYC advisory
  • Support in English and Russian
See Price
03 Amazon Setup & Tax Forms
  • U.S. Amazon Seller account creation
  • Bank account and EIN verification
  • W‑8BEN, 1099-K preparation and filing
  • Account verification support
  • Troubleshooting blocks and errors
See Price
04 U.S. Company Dissolution
  • Filing of official dissolution forms
  • Final IRS return preparation
  • Notify IRS, state, and registered agent
  • Check for remaining obligations
  • Confirmation of closure
See Price

How it works?

is officially launched!

register your company

You receive your EIN & open
your U.S. bank account
